name: MLHandPoseClassifier.ImageAugmentationOptions
desc: Options a hand pose classification training session can use to generate additional training data from the images you provide.

items.name: typealias MLHandPoseClassifier.ImageAugmentationOptions.RawValue
items.desc: An associated value that defines the underlying type of an augmentation.

items.name: typealias MLHandPoseClassifier.ImageAugmentationOptions.Element
items.desc: An associated value that defines the element of an augmentation.

items.name: typealias MLHandPoseClassifier.ImageAugmentationOptions.ArrayLiteralElement
items.desc: An associated value that defines the element of an augmentation array literal.
